Resistance.display_help: Freakshow are resistant to cold. However, they are vulnerable to energy damage. It shorts them out.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Sawblade.display_help: Cybernetically enhanced Freakshow can throw Sawblades with deadly force. So much force that they can sometimes knock down foes.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: You have been put to sleep by a Tesla Cage. Any damage will awaken you.
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by a Tesla Cage. Any damage will awaken you.

Resistance.display_help: Freakshow Tanks are resistant to smashing and lethal damage, Knockback and Disorient. However, they are vulnerable to energy damage. It shorts them out.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Smash, Lethal, KB, Disorient

Tank_Grenade.display_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from The Tanks backpack. The explosion from the grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
Tank_Grenade.display_target_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from The Tanks backpack. The explosion from the grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

Disruption_Field.display_help: You set up a constant wave of sonic energy around an ally, weakening the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate
Disruption_Field.display_target_help: The Disruption Field creates an area around you which reduces the Resistance of all foes near them.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shockwave.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Radiation_Emission.display_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Freakshow and restores some health to all nearby allies.
Radiation_Emission.display_target_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Freakshow and restores some health to all nearby allies.

Accelerate_Metabolism.display_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Freakshow Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. Freakshow are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.
Accelerate_Metabolism.display_target_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Freakshow Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. Freakshow are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.

Protection_Shield.display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Cloaking_Device.display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Cloaking_Device.display_target_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Shadow_Punch.display_help: The Shadow Punch has reduced your Accuracy.
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: The Shadow Punch has reduced your Accuracy.

Smite.display_help: The Smite attack has reduced your Accuracy.
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite attack has reduced your Accuracy.

Siphon_Life.display_help: The Siphon Life Attack has weakened you, reducing your Accuracy.
Siphon_Life.display_target_help: The Siphon Life Attack has weakened you, reducing your Accuracy.

Gloom.display_help: The Gloom Attack is dealing Negative energy damage over time to you and reducing your Accuracy.
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom Attack is dealing Negative energy damage over time to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Life_Drain.display_help: Super Freak has drained your life. Your Accuracy is reduced.
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Super Freak has drained your life. Your Accuracy is reduced.

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You have been enveloped in Tenebrous Tentacles. You are Immobilized and have your Accuracy reduced as you are crushed.
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: You have been enveloped in Tenebrous Tentacles. You are Immobilized and have your Accuracy reduced as you are crushed.

Electric_Fence.display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay and bringing down fliers. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Electric_Fence.display_target_help: You are immobilized by the Electric Fence.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: Tesla Cage confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: The Tesla Cage is holding you helpless.

Chain_Fences.display_help: You can immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor damage to all foes in range and draining some endurance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Chain_Fences.display_short_help: Ranged AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Foe Immobilize, -End
Chain_Fences.display_target_help: You are immobilized by the Chain Fences.

Static_Field.display_help: You can build up a Static Field at a nearby location. Any foes in the field may lose control of their muscles due to the static charge, and will shake violently. Foes may also be drained of some endurance, and some of that endurance may be transferred to nearby allies. Any attack will interrupt the effect temporarily and foes will re-gain control, although their movement and attack rates will be reduced. This effect can last for some time, and will continue to paralyze foes in the field. Recharge: Slow
Static_Field.display_target_help: You are temporarily paralyzed by the static field.

Paralyzing_Blast.display_help: Summoning a large amount of energy, you can completely paralyze a group of foes in cages of electricity for a short time. These foes may be drained of some endurance as well. Recharge: Very Long
Paralyzing_Blast.display_target_help: You have been caged by the Paralyzing Blast.

Reserve_Power.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 60 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
